scripts.start: concurrently -n 'server,client' -c 'magenta,cyan' "pm2 restart server.js" "cd client && pm2 restart npm"
scripts.update-project: concurrently -n 'updating server,updating client' -c 'blue,green' "npm install" "cd client && npm install"
scripts.stop: concurrently -n 'stopping server,stopping client' -c 'red,yellow' "pm2 stop server.js" "cd client && pm2 stop npm"
